articles.title: Greetings to President of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Joseph Kabila, President of Democratic Congo, on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of its independence. 
					 Kim in his message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Sudan
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Sudan
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Omar Hassan Ahmad AlÔºçBashir, President of Sudan, on the occasion of the 20th day of the Sudanese revolution. 
					 Kim in the message noted that since the victory of the revolution the Sudanese people have achieved many successes in the struggle to defend the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country and build a stable and prosperous new society.
					
					 It expressed belief that the ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the days ahead and sincerely wished the president and people of Sudan greater success in the work for the independent development of the country.

articles.title: North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theatre Completed
articles.content:
North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theatre Completed
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theater has been built as a monumental edifice in the era of Songun. 
					The more than 900 seater-theater covers a total area of at least 15,000 square meters. It has all facilities for art creation, performances and audience including a modern stage, cutting-edge sound and lighting equipment.
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the theater took place Monday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok and others and officials concerned, builders and servicepersons, officials and technicians of the units related to the construction and working people in Sariwon City. 
					
					Choe Ryong Hae, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his speech at the ceremony that the art theater is a palace of culture that sprang up thanks to the great care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has devoted his all to the happiness of the people, true to the noble will of President Kim Il Sung--believing in people as in Heaven. 
					
					 He underscored the need for the officials and employees to value and manage the building and facilities and regularly operate the theatre to contribute to the art creation and people's cultural and emotional life. 
					
					 That day an inaugural performance was given by the provincial art troupe at the theater.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the friendly delegation of Jilin Yuwen Middle School of China on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was handed to an official concerned by Wang Yong, secretary of party committee of the school, who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: "Potato Rice" Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
"Potato Rice" Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has recently succeeded in processing potato into "rice", which is tasty and nutritious.
					 The existing "potato rice" had been made by mixing potato with rice. But new one was made only with potato, which is not dissolved in water and very high in whiteness.
					
					 Boiled "potato rice" is delicious like boiled rice and nutritive as the potato contains rich vitamins.
					
					 With its powder one can cook various dishes such as bread, kkwabaegi (a kind of zeppole) and noodle which have better taste than those made directly from potato and are good to see.
					
					 As it is cooked faster than rice, it makes it possible to save fuel.
					
					 Those who have tasted boiled "potato rice" do not spare praise.
					
					 Now, a project for industrialization of "potato rice" production is going on in Musan County, North Hamgyong Province, a potato growing district in the country.

articles.title: "Handbook of Korean Animals" Off Press
articles.content:
"Handbook of Korean Animals" Off Press
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Science and Encyclopedia Publishing House has recently brought out "Handbook of Korean Animals" (part of amphibians and reptiles).
					The book deals with amphibians and reptiles in the order of introduction and detailed treatises and gives a comprehensive data on them.
					
					The names of more than 40 species of amphibians and reptiles which inhabit Korea are given in English, Russian, Chinese and Japanese and the form, ecology, distribution, economic value, etc. of each species are described with pictures.
					
					Also given are historical data of researches into amphibians and reptiles in the home and foreign zoological circles.
					
					"Handbook of Korean Animals" gives comprehensive knowledge of animal resources and strikes home to the readers the importance of the active protection and proliferation of animals.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Wisdom of Foreseeing Weather
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Wisdom of Foreseeing Weather
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- It was early in June of Juche 70 (1981) when President Kim Il Sung gave field guidance to a co-op farm. Looking round the farm, he riveted his eyes upon one place for a while.
					It was a magpie nest being made on a branch of a tall tree.
					
					After staring at it, the President asked officials why the magpies were making the nest entrance sideward, not upward.
					
					He told the officials, who racked their brains to find an answer to the unexpected question, that it would rain heavily this rainy season, it would not be an ordinary one but one accompanied with "torrential rain" and to make the entrance sideward was evidently for the magpies to protect their nest from the "torrential rain".
					
					He emphasized that all the farms in the country should take thorough-going measures against the rainstorm and flood.
					
					The officials looked up to and were deeply moved by the words of the President who clarified the essence of the question with prominent scientific penetration and extraordinary wisdom, seeing a natural phenomenon which was regarded as an ordinary one by others.
					
					As he forecasted, the country was visited by heavy rain rare to be seen in history.
					
					As the President taught, the officials and working people in the field of agriculture completed the preparation for preventing damage by heavy rain and storm before the rainy season and could protect all crops.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts U.S. Dangerous Moves for New War
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts U.S. Dangerous Moves for New War
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea on June 23 blustered before those concerned of the puppet army that the south Korean forces should get ready to cope with the possible large-scale conflicts and it was necessary for them to intensify exercises under the simulated conditions of an actual war.
					 He asserted earlier that the U.S. promise to provide a nuclear umbrella to south Korea would be definitely kept and a prompt reaction combat posture would be preserved through the "OPLAN-5027" and "OPLAN-5029." 
					
					 These are an intolerable declaration of actions to escalate the confrontation and reckless outbursts agitating a war as they fully reflect the U.S. scenario to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula in a bid to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and perpetuate its forces' presence in south Korea. 
					
					 It is the invariable U.S. policy of aggression against the DPRK to deteriorate the situation on the Korean Peninsula and start a new war under that pretext. 
					
					 Precisely for this reason the U.S. is now citing the DPRK's nuclear test as a pretext for rendering the situation on the peninsula extremely tense. 
					
					 The U.S. is now busy amassing its aggression forces in south Korea and in its vicinity and rounding off a new "operational plan," a more offensive and dangerous plan for starting a nuclear war against the DPRK. 
					
					 Moves to reorganize armed forces including the creation of a U.S.-south Korea CAC are now pushed forward in real earnest. 
					
					 The moves stepped up by the U.S. to work out the above-said war plan and reorganize armed forces are a prelude to a war of aggression. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that authorities of the U.S. and the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea blustered almost simultaneously that in case south Korea is exposed to somebody's "threat" the "U.S. would protect it."
					
					 They even touted what they called "extended deterrence," asserting that when south Korea is exposed to a nuclear attack, it should be countered with the same measure as taken when the U.S. mainland is attacked. 
					
					 To talk about coping with the DPRK's "threat" means, in essence, rhetoric intended to justify U.S. theory of preemptive attack. Lurking behind the outpourings of U.S. warmongers is a foolish attempt to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula on a legitimate basis and lay the blame for it at the door of the DPRK. 
					
					 The reality patently proves that the threat of war to the peninsula always comes from the U.S.  
					
					  Should the U.S. ignite a new war on this land despite the DPRK's repeated warnings, the DPRK will respond to it with all-out war and mete out a merciless punishment to the aggressors.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear War Gambling Disclosed
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear War Gambling Disclosed
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that Ohio-class subs of the U.S. forces equipped with nuclear warheads have been carrying out anti-DPRK operational duties in the Pacific. The U.S. warlike forces forward-deployed nuclear-powered super large carrier George Washington in waters close to Korea with an aim to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK and moved the Missile Defense System (MD) and radar network to Hawaii under the pretext of the DPRK's "missile launch."
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary says this is a clear indication that the U.S. seeks to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK with nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. is staging a dangerous nuclear war gambling while creating the impression that the DPRK is to blame for the present acute nuclear crisis on the Korean Peninsula, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 U.S. high-ranking officials are letting loose a spate of outbursts that the U.S. is ready to cope with "contingency to be created by north Korea" and necessary measures are being taken to "counter" whatever "threats" from north Korea. The ill-boding military moves taking place in the vicinity of the Korean Peninsula against this backdrop prove that the U.S. imperialists are deliberately straining the situation to ignite a nuclear war on it at any cost.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is intensifying its moves for a war while openly disclosing its scenario for nuclear strikes at the DPRK, the latter is left with no option but to bolster up its war deterrent for self-defence in every way.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop its dangerous nuclear war gamble, clearly understanding the essence of the situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppets' Racket of "Sanctions" against DPRK Bound to Go Bust
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppets' Racket of "Sanctions" against DPRK Bound to Go Bust
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is taking the lead in backing the U.S. criminal "sanctions" against the DPRK and putting them into practice. This is a serious political and military provocation to the DPRK and an unpardonable treacherous act of pushing the inter-Korean relations and the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an uncontrollable catastrophe. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					  The south Korean authorities' racket of "sanctions" against the DPRK amounts, in essence, to an open act to bring the inter-Korean relations to collapse and an extremely reckless hysteria intended to stifle fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Lee group is again becoming so ridiculous as to let loose rhetoric about "sincerity" and "aid" in a bid to cover up the treacherous and anti-reunification nature of "the sanctions" applied by them against the DPRK in collusion with outside forces. With no artifice can the group of traitors hide its sinister intention to bring the inter-Korean relations to collapse and stifle the DPRK lurking behind the above-said ruckus of "sanctions." 
					
					 It is the scenario of the Lee group to invade the north by force of arms. To this end it is keen to spark off military conflicts between the north and the south by infringing upon the DPRK's dignity and sovereignty under the pretext of implementing the UNSC "resolution" and then ignite an all-out war.
					
					 The Lee group is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can gain something through the above-said "sanctions," counting on its U.S. master. The "sanctions" would only lead to a war and destruction of provocateurs. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to stop at once their reckless acts, mindful that their racket of "sanctions" against the DPRK would only precipitate their miserable end.

articles.title: Suppression of Campus Movement Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Campus Movement Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different circles in south Korea issued statements on June 25 in denunciation of the puppet authorities' scheme to stifle the campus movement.
					 The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in its statement noted that on June 24 the police hurriedly arrested the ex-chairman of the Seoul District Federation of University Student Councils (Sochongryon) under Hanchongryon (south Korean Federation of University Student Councils) on charges of violating the "National Security Law".
					
					 Earlier, the Lee Myung Bak "government" arrested Ri Hui Chol, chairman of 8th-term Hanchongryon, and others involved in the youth and student movement in the past one after another and searched their houses while getting evermore pronounced in the repressive campaign under the pretext of security, it charged.
					
					 It pointed out that the security authorities are frantically investigating even into the past case and bringing harsh suppression on those youth and student activists in a bid to quell the surging indignation of the people at the present "government".
					
					 The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in its statement denounced the violent repression by the authorities as a scheme to crack down upon the youth and students taking the lead in the anti-"government" struggle and stifle the campus movement.
					
					 All the youth and students should more vigorously wage the overall struggle for forcing the Lee Myung Bak "government" to resign, it said, urging the Lee group to set free the ex-chairman of Sochongryon and other youth and student activists at once.

articles.title: Anti-"government" Campaign in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"government" Campaign in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union in south Korea called an emergency press conference in Yongdungpho, Seoul, on June 26, declaring that it would turn out in the second campaign of announcing the declaration on the situation to protest the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' reckless repression.
					 Speakers at the conference charged that the Ministry of Education, Science and Technology decided to discipline the teachers affiliated who took part in the campaign for declaration on the situation protesting the Lee regime's dictatorial policy.
					
					 The declaration on the situation made public by the union is the strong voice of the teachers demanding the democratization of society, guarantee of people's basic rights and repeal of wrong education policy, they stressed.
					
					 Nevertheless, the authorities are seeking to punish the teachers and such repression is evidently a sinister deed designed to check the people's expression of will and quell their resentment, they pointed out, stating that all the teachers would brave any sacrifice.
					
					 Saying that they can never overlook the fact that the ministry is violating even the basic rights of the people and cracking down upon the teachers by abusing authority, they declared that the union would fight to the last to achieve democracy together with the people.

articles.title: Violent Behavior of Conservatives Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Violent Behavior of Conservatives Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils released a statement on June 25, slashing at the gang of conservatives' riotous conduct.
					 The statement charged that at dawn of June 24 the conservative gangsters assaulted an incense-burning altar for the late former "president" installed near the Deogsu Palace in Seoul and removed it by use of violence and did not hesitate to commit such sinister deed as displaying the photo of the late at a "meeting" as if it is a "trophy."
					
					 Some days ago, the gangsters fired gas guns at citizens there, threatening them to remove from there and the police connived at such violent actions, it pointed out.
					
					 The people's resentment and hatred toward the Lee Myung Bak "government" are now further surging up, it said, contending that the only way is to force the present authorities to resign and eliminate them.
					
					 The statement urged the Lee "government" to severely punish those gangsters involved in the violent actions.

articles.title: Repression of Reunification Champions in S. Korea Protested
articles.content:
Repression of Reunification Champions in S. Korea Protested
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) made public a statement on June 24 in protest against the south Korean puppet authorities' crackdown upon members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					 The statement noted that the prosecution authorities detained and charged Chairman Ri Kyu Jae, Secretary General Ri Kyong Won, Chairperson of the Information Committee Choe Un A of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon with violation of the "National Security Law" on the same day.
					
					 Such suppression is hardening the overseas compatriots' faith and will to fight to the last with the sycophantic and treacherous forces standing against the DPRK, the reunification and the nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country without fail, it said.
					
					 It pointed out that the Lee Myung Bak "government's" incrimination of those reunification champions, who have worked to implement the June 15 joint declaration warmly supported by the entire nation and the whole world, is intended to stamp out the reunification movement.
					
					 The statement warned that the south Korean authorities would face punishment by history and the nation for their violent repression of the reunification movement organizations including the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolution" Rejected in Nepal
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolution" Rejected in Nepal
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Fifteen political parties and organizations in Nepal, including the Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the Worker-Peasant Party, the Peace Action Committee, the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee, the Journalist Association, the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association and the Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea, made public a joint statement on June 23 in denunciation of the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 The statement expressed deep apprehensions over the tense situation of the Korean Peninsula getting worse due to the "resolution" cooked up at the instigation of the United States.
					
					 It held that the countries concerned of denuclearization of the peninsula should implement to the letter all the agreements reached with the DPRK.
					
					 It is the legitimate right of the DPRK and other sovereign states to take every possible measure, including nuclear test, so as to defend their sovereignty from the imperialist forces' hostile actions, the statement said, strongly urging the U.S. to take steps for defusing the tension of the Korean Peninsula by peaceful means, not by sanctions.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Statement Favored
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Statement Favored
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Organizations in Palestine and Sri Lanka and a regional body expressed full support for the June 13 statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The Secretariat of the Palestine Resistance Organization grouping Palestinian struggle organizations in Syria released a statement on June 17 to denounce the U.S. imperialists and their stooges' scheme to bring the Korean people into submission and put the Korean Peninsula under their complete domination.
					
					 The DPRK has the right to bolster up its self-reliant defence capability and develop science and technology in order to protect its sovereignty and achieve prosperity and development, the statement stressed, supporting all measures taken by the DPRK led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association and the Sri Lankan Committee of Self-Reliance Studies in a statement on June 23 decisively rejected the UNSC "Resolution 1874" and hailed the DPRK Foreign Ministry statement.
					
					 We condemn the campaign the imperialists are staging against the DPRK in international arena and will vigorously struggle for peace and progress of mankind, the statement said.
					
					 The African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People in its statement on June 19 said that genuine peace and stability can never be achieved unless every country, big or small, abides by the principle of equality. And it strongly urged the UNSC to repeal its "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK at once.

articles.title: Korean Exhibitions Held Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Exhibitions Held Abroad
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions were held in Russia and Nigeria and by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement between June 15 and 23 to commemorate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display at the exhibition halls were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos showing their undying feats, books and photos introducing the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and handicraft works associated with the Korean nation's wisdom and talents. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremonies of opening the exhibitions.
					
					 Sorokin, deputy mayor of Klin in Moscow Region of Russia, noted that the DPRK demonstrated its tremendous national strength by successfully launching satellite Kwangmyongsong-2. This is a result of the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il leading Korean-style socialism to victory with matchless courage, he said.
					
					 The curator of the exhibition of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria praised Kim Jong Il as a statesman most prominent in ideology, leadership and personality. Under his distinguished guidance the Korean people have achieved brilliant victories, braving all hardships and difficulties and the DPRK is demonstrating its might to the whole world, he added.

articles.title: Biography of President Kim Il Sung Published
articles.content:
Biography of President Kim Il Sung Published
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 3 (enlarged edition) of book "Biography of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" compiled by the Party History Institute of the WPK Central Committee.
					 This volume (Chapters 26-41) systematically deals with the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by wisely leading the struggle for the overall construction of socialism and its complete victory and making distinguished contribution to the cause of national reunification and the strengthening of the anti-imperialist independent forces in the period from January Juche 50 (1961) to October Juche 69 (1980).
					
					 Contained in the book are historical data on the ideo-theoretical activities and energetic guidance of the President who established the Juche-based economic management system in keeping with the requirement of the changed circumstances and brought about a radical turn in the work of the party and the working people's organizations so as to successfully push ahead with the overall construction of socialism.
					
					 It also tells about the facts that the President advanced the reasonable policies for the successful progress of the south Korean revolution and the cause of national reunification one after another and wisely guided the struggle for their materialization while leading the revolution and construction in the northern half of Korea to victory.
					
					 Described in the book in an overall way are the undying feats of the President who made enormous contributions to realizing the human cause of independence. It deals with the facts that he wisely led the struggle for the world revolution after advancing outstanding strategic and tactical policies, steadily maintained the independent stand in the Korean revolution and construction while rejecting the outsiders' interference, rendered disinterested support to the peoples of the countries fighting against the U.S. and developing countries and so forth.

articles.title: Swiss Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed
articles.content:
Swiss Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Switzerland on June 21.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The remembrance committee set the days from June 21 to July 8 as a period of remembrance and decided to widely introduce the greatness and immortal revolutionary exploits of the President and hold colorful events in the period.

articles.title: Inaugurado Teatro de Arte de la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte
articles.content:
Inaugurado Teatro de Arte de la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte
 Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ATCC) -- Fue edificado el Teatro de Arte de la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte como otra excelente creacion monumental de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					  En este teatro con una superficie arquitectonica de mas de 15 mil metros cuadrados estan preparadas todas las condiciones para la creacion del arte, las funciones artisticas y el disfrute de ellas como el hall con mas de 900 asientos, la escena y los ultramodernos equipos acusticos y de iluminacion.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 29 la ceremonia inaugural con la presencia de Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, y otros cuadros, los constructores, los militares, los funcionarios de las unidades relacionadas, los tecnicos y los trabajadores de la ciudad de Sariwon.
					
					  El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo del secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, Choe Ryong Hae.
					
					  El orador destaco que este teatro es el centro cultural construido gracias a la gran venevolencia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien segun el noble ideario de Iminwichon (significa considerar al pueblo como cielo) concebido por el Presidente   Kim Il Sung, dedica todo lo suyo a las labores para la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					  Los funcionarios y empleados del teatro deben cuidar bien el edificio y los equipos y ponerlos en funcionamiento normal para contribuir a la creacion artistica y a la vida cultural del pueblo, apunto.
					
					   El mismo dia, el Conjunto Artistico de esa provincia ofrecio la funcion inaugural del teatro.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de la delegacion de la Escuela Yuwen
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de la  delegacion de la Escuela Yuwen
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera la delegacion de amistad de la Escuela Secundaria Yuwen en Jilin, China, presidida por el secretario del partido en esta escuela Wang Yong, de visita en Corea.
					  El jefe de la delegacion lo entrego a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: ATCC comenta sospechosos movimientos para la nueva Guerra
articles.content:
ATCC comenta sospechosos movimientos para la nueva Guerra
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ATCC) -- El comandante de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea pronuncio el dia 23 un discurso acalorado instruyendo a los oficiales interesados del ejercito titere surcoreano "prepararse para hacer frente al eventual conflicto armado de gran envergadura" e "intensificar los ejercicios de combate del 'ejercito'".
					  Con anterioridad, dijo que "seguiria en pie la promesa de Estados Unidos de ofrecer el paraguas nuclear" y "se mantendria la disposicion de entrar inmediatamente en el combate a traves de los 'planes operacionales 5027 y 5029'".
					
					  Esta imperdonable hablilla conflictiva y belicista es un reflejo directo de la intencion de EE.UU. de desencadenar la nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana para atropellar por via militar a la RPDC y ocupar para siempre el territorio surcoreano.
					
					  La invariable politica de EE.UU. para la agresion a la RPDC consiste en exacerbar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y provocar la nueva guerra tomandolo por pretexto.
					
					  De ahi que este imperio lleva ahora al extremo la situacion de esa area pretextando la reciente prueba nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					  Efectivamente, esta emplazando en el suelo surcoreano y su contorno un gran numero de sus tropas agresoras y perfecciona el nuevo "plan operacional" mas ofensivo y aventurero para desatar la guerra nuclear.
					
					  Ademas, se mueve intensamente para instaurar la "comandancia de las fuerzas aereas conjuntas" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea como colofon de la reorganizacion de sus fuerzas armadas.
					
					  Sin dudas, estas acciones del imperio constituyen el preludio de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					  Lo que no se puede soslayar es que los gobernantes norteamericanos y el jefe de las tropas yanquis estacionadas en el suelo surcoreano dijeron casi simultaneamente que "su pais defenderia" al Sur de Corea cuando este fuera "amenazado" por alguien.
					
					  Para colmo, estan planteando la teoria del "disuasivo ampliado", segun la cual el imperio responderia al ataque nuclear al Sur de Corea en el mismo nivel que el de la reaccion al golpe a su propio territorio nacional.
					
					  Enfrentarse a la supuesta "amenaza" de la RPDC es, en su esencia, justificar la doctrina de EE.UU. del ataque preventivo contra ella.
					
					  Detras de los disparates de los belicistas yanquis esta el necio intento de provocar legitimamente la nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana e imputar la responsabilidad a la RPDC.
					
					  La realidad demuestra claramente que la amenaza de guerra proviene siempre de EE.UU. en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Si EE.UU. desata la nueva guerra pese a la reiterada advertencia de la RPDC, esta le respondera con la guerra total y castigara despiadadamente a los agresores.

articles.title: Hecho con la patata en Corea el arroz blanco
articles.content:
Hecho con la patata en Corea el arroz blanco
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, se ha hecho con la papa en Corea un nuevo arroz blanco.
					  A diferencia de los anteriores granos de patata, el nuevo arroz se ha hecho completamente con esta planta tuberculosa y mantiene las propiedades del arroz blanco natural como que no se disuelve en el agua y es muy blanco.
					
					El arroz cocido con el nuevo grano les gusto mucho a los que lo probaron porque es muy delicioso y nutritivo gracias a las vitaminas que contiene en abundancia la patata.
					
					  Ademas, es posible preparar con su harina varios platos como el pan, la rosquilla y el fideo que resultan mas sabrosos y agradables a la vista que los cocinados directamente con la papa.
					
					  Se puede conservarlo en las mismas condiciones que las requeridas para la conservacion del arroz blanco natural y ahorrar el combustible porque cuece mas rapido que el segundo.
					
					  Actualmente, en el distrito de Musan de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, zona productora de la patata, esta en plena marcha la construccion de procesos tecnicos para industrializar la produccion del arroz blanco de patata.
